entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
